TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler(object sender, DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs)
public delegate void DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将用来处理 的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以自定义格式适用于显示的一个单元格值的转换，或自定义的具体取决于其状态或值的单元格的外观。Handle the event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value. 每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理处理此事件时，事件时发生。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也会发生此事件时该单元格检索或其调用方法。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 当处理事件，与单元格的值初始化属性。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果你提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置转换后的值，以确保新值所指定单元格的类型属性属性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示没有进一步设置值的格式设置必要，请设置属性`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`、格式都是使用， ， ，和属性返回的单元格样式属性，使用该单元格初始化属性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 无论的值如何属性，返回的对象的显示属性属性用于呈现该单元格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 有关自定义格式设置使用的详细信息事件，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，请通过事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格的参数访问单元格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自定义格式化、 用户指定的值转换为实际的单元值，处理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#1)]
